channel.title: 508 gfx help plz
channel.description: Hey guys. I need help with my gfx codes. How would you raise the height of 1? Like on most servers when you do vengeance the skull is like on your head. How would i higher it to be like on runescape? So its above your head in the air? Thank you.

item.title: 508 gfx help plz
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Add this method:

public void gfx110(int gfx) { mask100var1 = gfx; mask100var2 = 6553600; mask100update = true; updateRequired = true; }

You would do for example ‘gfx100(100);’.

Read full topic
